body.name: Computer Speakers, Hi-Fi Sound Quality Computer Sound Bar, Bluetooth 5.0 & 3.5mm Wired PC Speakers with 4 Dynamic Lighting Modes, USB Powered Speakers for PC, Desktop, Laptops, Phones, Monitors, Xbox
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 41 mins
features: ✅【Top-notch Stereo】Nylavee computer speakers equip with two double-layer neodymium magnets speaker units & two independent bass diaphragms to provide rich high pitch and powerful bass. Whether you're watching movies, playing games, or streaming music, this computer sound bar will provide you with an unparalleled audio experience.

✅【4 Dynamic Lighting Modes】Nylavee monitor speakers comes with 4 dynamic RGB lighting modes that can be customized to your liking. The lighting modes include rainbow mode, breathing mode, flowing mode, and rhythm mode, adding an extra level of visual appeal to your entertainment setup.

✅【2 Connection Methods】 There are 2 connection methods for the pc speakers which are Bluetooth and 3.5mm Aux wired connections. Nylavee desktop speakers are compatible with laptops, desktops, PCs, monitors, phones, tablets, Xbox, PS4, etc.

✅【USB Powered & One-Knob Operation】 Nylavee speakers for pc have no built-in battery, just plug the USB plug into any power source then it will turn on automatically. All functions of the USB speaker can be operated by the side knob.

✅【The Advantages】 The special cavity design and luxury configurations of Nylavee desktop speakers not only bring a deep and powerful bass but also a clear and rich high-pitch performance. Perfect computer sound bar for bedroom.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 275 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid bluetooth speaker with some RGB bling on a budget!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a cheap small speaker for my workshop while I worked on stuff. Requirements were that it'd have no battery and could be powered off usb so I could just swap powerbanks when they die, and have both bluetooth and aux input so I could plug in portable audio players. This model seemed like it'd work well and it was only $50 so I gave it a shot. So far here's my breakdown on pros and cons of this speaker:Pros:- Was packaged very well, foam to prevent damage during shipping- Easy to use, didn't even have to read the manual to figure it out- Has many different RGB lighting modes from solid, color fading, RGB scrolling bar, VU meter that dances to music and off in case you want no flashing lights- Remembers settings when unplugged (volume, bluetooth or aux, rgb setting), this is a big one as many speakers don't for some reason and it's super annoying to have to constantly reset settings- Compact footprint but louder that I expected given the size- Weight feels good and has nice rubber feet, doesn't rattle or slide on surfaces- Volume knob on side is awesome, rotating controls volume and pressing in changes led light effects/color (holding for a few seconds toggles bluetooth/aux input modes)- No problem with bluetooth cutting out while I move around and pairs up quickly/without any issue- Can be powered off just about any usb port, charger or powerbank- Cables come with a nice velcro wire wrap to keep them tidyCons:- Don't expect this little guy to fill large rooms or pump out lots of bass, but to be fair it does sound better than I expected as the pictures make it look bigger than it was when it arrived. This will blow your phone/laptop/cheap computer speakers out of the water but won't compete against $100+ big brand bluetooth speakers.- USB+aux cords are permanently wired to the back. They are ~2.5 feet long but I wish they were either a bit longer or just used jacks on the back so I could plug in longer cords.- Looks like it's always powered on when plugged into usb, there's no soft-power off function (at least I haven't been able to figure it out, should probably read the manual)Overall I'm pretty happy with it, it fits my needs and didn't cost too much while also not being cheap quality either. I'd recommend it to others with similar needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Sound and Design in One Package
reviews.reviewText: I just recently got my hands on this speaker, and I have to say that it's a terrific product that successfully blends functionality, performance, and a stylish look. Although they are in the same price range, the sound quality of the speaker is considerably greater than the one I now own. With ease, this speaker switches between wired and wireless connections to accommodate different connectivity preferences.Also, the minimalist design caught my attention immediately, featuring just one knob that serves multiple purposes. It's both intuitive and functional, allowing you to adjust the volume, switch between modes, toggle LED settings, and control music playback with ease.It is a great product, easy to use, and sleek design for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Soundbar for the price
reviews.reviewText: This soundbar features RGB lighting and Bluetooth and 3.5mm jack connections, making it a fantastic addition to my workstation/gaming setup. It significantly improved my audio experience and also adds a touch of style to my CPU. Its USB-powered design makes it very convenient and easy since the PC itself powers it through the port without the need for an additional electrical outlet.As for the sound, don't expect a full-blown cinematic surround sound system, but for gaming, music, and movies at your desk, it does its job more than adequately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid but not very loud
reviews.reviewText: Honestly pretty cool, easy set up for Bluetooth, but the volume cap is super low barely louder than the speakers of my projector but the sound quality is better so I’ll keep em

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A well made sound bar, nice upgrade for the built-in speaker
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The soundbar is well made, it looks really nice and clean with only one large control wheel right off to the side. Very convenient and easy to adjust volume. I used it to replace the monitor built-in speakers. It fits nicely right under my monitor and makes the sound much better and louder. The audio quality is also quite good given it's size.It is USB powered and supports AUX and Bluetooth connection. The RGB strip is very cool to look at. Overall, this is a great soundbar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this purchase! It works and looks great! Sound is clean, it was very easy to set up, and a good price. I do recommend plugging it into the computer if your using it for pc audio, Bluetooth sound will be a bit lagged. Bluetooth does work great as well I've used it for music connected to my phone as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic speaker bar for the price point!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is easily one of the best speaker bars at this price point. I’m very happy with it–I’ve used it for gaming, music and during Zoom meetings at work (which is less fatiguing than my tinny laptop speakers).In my video I show all the features of the speaker bar and they are all easily accessed by the single rotary control knob on the side. Bluetooth connectivity is simple and fast and the included 3.5mm audio cable is nice and long to reach your system without having to drag one or the other closer to where you want it.The speaker has great clarity for its size. It isn’t tinny as other speaker bars I’ve bought, and the bass response is good for its size. It also doesn’t distort at high volume which is great and has a peak volume limit to protect the speakers. It gets plenty loud-enough to fill a room with sound.I’m not a fan of flashy LEDs, but these are very unobtrusive and can be changed or turned off easily by the control knob. Show this as well in the video.In short, for the price point there is no reason to get this speaker bar… it’s a real bargain and a nice upgrade from standard PC speakers!
